title: Steelers-Bengals MNF Recap, Burfict suspended, Which 2-2 teams are for real? (Football 10/1)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Ryan Wilson, John Breech and Sean Wagner-McGough to recap the Steelers dominant victory over the Bengals on Monday Night Football (1:00). The SuperFriends discuss Bad Andy Dalton, Cincy's lack of urgency and a disappointing start from Zac Taylor. They also evaluate the performance of Mason Rudolph in his 2nd start and if Pittsburgh can make some noise in the AFC North (14:00). Next, the guys analyze Vontaze Burfict's season-long suspension (30:00), injuries to Mitchell Trubisky (38:00) and Josh Allen (42:30), and Bradley Chubb's season-ending ACL injury (45:30). Finally, the crew dissects 2-2 teams, labeling them contenders or pretenders (57:30). 
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
